    • apply

      public int apply() throws InconsistentDataException, IllegalStateException, DataBushPackedException
      This method execute apply method on owner of this list.
      Returns:
      a int integer which indicate if method succeded
      Throws:
      InconsistentDataException - if different bendings in list demands different current.
      IllegalStateException - if any.
      DataBushPackedException - if any.
